title.newValue: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Updates to quarantine folder storage

description.newValue:
Microsoft Defender for Office 365 is making some changes to quarantine folder storage. The experience for users will remain the same and users can leverage the delete action to maintain the storage folder for their quarantined messages.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-defender-for-office/simplifying-the-quarantine-experience-part-two/ba-p/3354687
GA date: June CY2022
